msContents.summary: F. i v: Excerpt of chant, Mäwaś‘ǝt chants, መዋሥዕት። for the departed. F. iii r-v r: Excerpt of Scripture readings for various times in the week. Ff. vi r-vii r: Excerpt of Vision of John, Son of Thunder, on the Dual Virginity of Mary, ራዕየ፡ ተአምር። ዘዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ነጐድጓድ፡. For a critical edition and English translation, see Getatchew Haile, The Mariology of Emperor Zär’a Ya‘ǝqob of Ethiopia, OCA 242 (Rome: Pontificium Institutum Studiorum Orientalium, 1992). Ff. viii rv: Excerpt of the Miracle of Mary where Mary teaches Ephrem to chant the Praises of Mary. Ff. x r-xiv v (a small booklet inserted in this book): Excerpt of readings for funeral ritual, written in a 20th century hand. F. xi v mentions the scribe, ኃይለ ገብርኤል, and the owner, ገብረ ሚካኤል. F-xxx: Funeral Ritual, መጽሐፈ፡ ግንዘት፡. Published more than once: መጽሐፈ፡ ግንዘት። (Roma, 1908), etc. Ff 132rv: List of readings in memory of the departed, written in a different hand. has a scribal note regarding the scribe and curses on anyone who steals or defaces the book.
